name: listArtifactVersions
description:
Returns a list of all version numbers for the artifact.

This operation can fail for the following reasons:

* No artifact with this `artifactId` exists (HTTP error `404`)
* A server error occurred (HTTP error `500`)

artifactId.description: The artifact ID.  Can be a string (client-provided) or integer (server-generated) representing the unique artifact identifier.

$block:
All error responses, whether `4xx` or `5xx` will include one of these as the response
body.

$ul: **detail**: Full details about the error.  This might contain a server stack trace, for example.
